description:
This resource will help you to manager Container Registry Enterprise Edition sync rules.

For information about Container Registry Enterprise Edition sync rules and how to use it, see [Create a Sync Rule](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/doc-detail/145280.htm)

-> **NOTE:** Available in v1.90.0+.

-> **NOTE:** You need to set your registry password in Container Registry Enterprise Edition console before use this resource.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

InstanceId.description: ID of Container Registry Enterprise Edition source instance.

Name.description: Name of Container Registry Enterprise Edition sync rule.

NamespaceName.description: Name of Container Registry Enterprise Edition source namespace. It can contain 2 to 30 characters.

RepoName.description: Name of the source repository which should be set together with `target_repo_name`, if empty means that the synchronization scope is the entire namespace level.

TagFilter.description: The regular expression used to filter image tags for synchronization in the source repository.

TargetInstanceId.description: ID of Container Registry Enterprise Edition target instance to be synchronized.

TargetNamespaceName.description: Name of Container Registry Enterprise Edition target namespace to be synchronized. It can contain 2 to 30 characters.

TargetRegionId.description: The target region to be synchronized.
